titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 251) directing the Secretary of the Treasury to transmit to the House of Representatives all information in his possession relating to specific communications with American International Group, Inc. (AIG).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. LaTourette. Petition No: 111-3.

bill.summary: 4/23/2009--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 251 (directing the Secretary of the Treasury to transmit to the House of Representatives all information in his possession relating to specific communications with American International Group, Inc. [AIG]).
